page.title: 12A FARLEY CHILD'S DAY
page.content: My name is Allyssa Gregory. I get up at seven o'clock a.m. and go to the bathroom to clean my teeth and wash my hands and face. I then go to get dressed and brush my hair. It's a Wednesday morning and nice and sunny. I then go downstairs to let the dogs out, I have two dogs called Mindy and Dee. I also have three cats called Tiki, Tuppence and Tiddles. After a while my two brothers, Tim and Ben, come downstairs. I clean my shoes and then have my breakfast (normally Rice Crispies). Mum makes us all a cup of tea and at about twenty past eight we go out to the car and set off to school. We get to school just before nine o'clock. I go into the playground to see all my friends. At nine o'clock the bell rings and we go to our class rooms and then to assembly.
